attributes.action: Deport and block entry into UK to ANY foreign or EU national after committing any crime in the UK, especially Romanians.
attributes.additional_details:
At the end of 2013 the Government has to allow Romanians and Bulgarians unrestricted rights to enter the UK, which from the perspective of a lot victims of pickpocketing in London, and our weak economy and benefit system in the UK, is a ludicrous and terrifying idea.

Importantly, there does not seem to be an effective system in place to a) remove the perpetrators of crime b) block their access to the UK c) prevent them and their families claiming benefits on the simple 'habitual residency test' which to be honest can be easily completed, or falsified, by someone of basic intelligence.

STOP entry into UK to any thief / benefit tourist
STOP the abuse of our over generous system
STOP re-entry into UK after deportation
IMPLEMENT 1 crime = deportation and barring to the UK, regardless of connections or family in UK.

DEMAND the EU stop overriding our rules on our domestic affairs, and DEMAND they review membership of the EU of corrupt and crime ridden countries like Romania.
